Detailed Description

The BTTracker class implements the tracker functionalities.

Date:
2009-06-09
Version:
1.2
Author:
Blekinge Institute of Technology TEK-ATS

void BTTracker::initialize (  ) 

Sets up the tracker.

Must be called upon creation of the simulation. This is done by OMNeT++ itself.

void BTTracker::setAmountOfClients ( int  clients  )
